entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
